entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being on Harry's behalf, showing his loyalty and support for Harry. ("Ron’s indignation on his behalf was worth about a hundred points to him.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is described as being in first place along with Krum. ("You’re tied in first place, Harry! You and Krum!")

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is mentioned as being tied in first place with Harry. ("You’re tied in first place, Harry! You and Krum!")

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as being on the same side as Harry when they were facing a challenge. ("...most of the school had been on his side as well as Cedric’s.")

entities.name: charlie weasley
entities.description: Charlie Weasley is mentioned as being present and congratulating Harry on being tied in first place. ("You’re tied in first place, Harry! You and Krum!")

relationships.description: Ron is supporting Harry by being on his behalf. ("Ron’s indignation on his behalf was worth about a hundred points to him.")
Charlie Weasley is congratulating Harry on being tied in first place. ("You’re tied in first place, Harry! You and Krum!")
Harry and Krum are tied in first place. ("You’re tied in first place, Harry! You and Krum!")
